mapper.select: SELECT m.uid uid,m.realname realName,m.avatar profilePhoto FROM ims_ewei_shop_order o join ims_ewei_shop_member m on o.uid = m.uid where o.status = 3 and o.createtime >=#{startTime} and o.createtime <=#{endTime} GROUP BY o.openid ORDER BY sum(o.price) desc limit 6;

SELECT u.uid,m.realname realName,m.avatar profilePhoto FROM ims_ewei_shop_order o join ims_ewei_shop_member m on o.uid = m.uid LEFT join ims_users u ON u.uid=m.uid where o.status = 3 and o.createtime >=#{startTime} and o.createtime <=#{endTime} GROUP BY o.openid ORDER BY sum(o.price) desc limit 100;

SELECT count(*) from (SELECT m.realname realName,m.avatar profilePhoto FROM ims_ewei_shop_order o join ims_ewei_shop_member m on o.openid = m.openid where o.status = 3 and o.createtime >=#{startTime} and o.createtime <=#{endTime} GROUP BY o.openid ORDER BY sum(o.price) desc) a;
